text: Kandi rwose buri muryango (umat) twawoherejemo intumwa (kugira ngo ibabwire iti) "Nimusenge Allah (wenyine) kandi mwirinde (gusenga) ibigirwamana". Muri boharimo abo Allah yayoboye, ndetse no muri bo hari abokamwe n’ubuyobe. nimutambagire ku isi, maze murebe Bityo uko iherezo ry’abahinyuye ukuri ryagenze
